definition[0]: a small sign or picture on a computer screen that is used to start a particular operation
example[0]: To open a new file, click on the icon.
definition[1]: someone famous who is admired by many people and is thought to represent an important idea
definition[2]: a picture or figure of a holy person that is used in worship in the Greek or Russian Orthodox Church
example[2]: First open your File Manager by clicking on the icon.
